phrases.opening_e4_c5_sicilian: Who's ready for something sharp!

name: Francis
description: Don't let his friendly demeanor off the board lull you to sleep! Francis is a vicious attacker and will checkmate you the first chance he gets.

phrases.opening_e4: 1.e4! Time for some swashbuckling.

phrases.opening_other: Interesting. Let's play something creative.

phrases.computer_loses: Who's your coach?? Can I have another chance?
phrases.computer_draws: How on earth did we draw that. One more?

phrases.computer_is_losing: Wow. You're doing great. I'll need to go over this game with my coach later.
phrases.player_gives_check: Yes...yes...How should I protect my king?
phrases.computer_captures_queen: First the queen, then the king.
phrases.player_captures_queen: Who needs queens anyway?
phrases.computer_promotes: All right. What should I choose?
phrases.player_promotes: All the way there. What would you like?
phrases.first_capture: I'll take that one.
phrases.threatening: I'm coming for you! Watch out.
phrases.threatened: What are you up to?
phrases.computer_has_mate_in_x: If my calculations are correct, I'll have checkmate soon.
phrases.player_has_mate_in_x: Do you really have a mate? How did I not see that coming?
phrases.random: Isn't chess fun?
phrases.opening_e4: What a great way to get started!
phrases.opening_d4: Buckle up! This should be fun.
phrases.opening_c4_english: 1.c4 is a great opening!
phrases.opening_nf3: 1.Nf3 does not give a lot of info, I like it!

phrases.opening_d4_nf6_indian: Let's make it intersting! King's Indian today or something else?
phrases.opening_d4_d5_queens_gambit: Nice start! Very classical.
phrases.opening_other: Hmmm. I haven't studied that one yet.

name: Alexander
description: Alexander is all strengths and no weaknesses. He wants to be World Chess Champion one day!

phrases.greeting: Privet. I hope you're ready. Good luck!
phrases.computer_wins: Don't feel bad. One day you can say you lost to the World Chess Champion.
phrases.computer_loses: That was unexpected.
phrases.computer_draws: Good game. You played incredibly well. Would you like to play again to break the tie?
phrases.computer_is_winning: I think I've got this one!
phrases.computer_is_losing: Wow! You're playing really well, but I might have another trick or two up my sleeve.
phrases.player_gives_check: I'm not worried.
phrases.computer_captures_queen: I'll take the queen, thank you!
phrases.player_captures_queen: You can have her. She's done her job.
phrases.computer_promotes: Now what piece should I get?
phrases.player_promotes: A new one? Well, that shouldn't last long.
phrases.first_capture: And the pieces start coming off...
phrases.threatening: Do you see what I'm going for?
phrases.threatened: Nice try, but I see what you're doing.

phrases.opening_d4_d5_queens_gambit: Very classical. Capablanca would be proud.
phrases.opening_other: Something offbeat today? No problem. I have studied this.

name: Luke
description: Being slowly squeezed by Luke is no fun. Well, not for you, at least.

phrases.greeting: Hey there! Can you squeeze in a game?
phrases.computer_wins: Good game! Care for another one?
phrases.computer_loses: Well, I can't win them all.

name: Wei

phrases.opening_d4_d5_queens_gambit: Queen's gambit?
phrases.opening_other: Very interesting. I'll have to be on my toes today.

name: xQc
description: xQc is a streaming superstar and former professional Overwatch player. He made his mark on the chess world in PogChamps - do you have what it takes to defeat the Canadian superstar?

phrases.greeting: BING. BANG. BOOM. Let’s do this!
phrases.computer_wins: GG, no shame losing to the gaming warlord. Again?
phrases.computer_loses: *Slams Desk*  AHHHHHH! GO AGANE!! Here, take my shield, you’re going to need this.

phrases.computer_promotes: Boom!

phrases.first_capture: Bing!
phrases.opening_e4: Hikaru taught me that 1.e4 is the best move!
phrases.opening_c4_english: This is the English?

phrases.opening_d4_nf6_indian: Knight moves are cool.
phrases.opening_d4_d5_queens_gambit: 1…d5 looks good.
phrases.opening_other: What do you call this? Play a real opening!

name: MrBeast
description: MrBeast is one of the top content creators on YouTube, with more than 100 million subscribers across all of his social media channels. Can you defeat this PogChamps 3 player?

phrases.greeting: WHAT'S UP GUYS! Today I'm going to be giving away some expensive pieces to random players! Wanna do this?
phrases.computer_wins: Massive announcement today: I WON! Let's do another one?
phrases.computer_loses: DARN IT! Why would you do this to me? Well, just go to shopmrbeast, and I'll forgive you. Rematch?

phrases.computer_gives_check: New video idea: I checked my opponent 5,000 times

phrases.player_captures_queen: Do you like my queen donation?
phrases.computer_promotes: I haven't felt this good since I ate that $100,000 ice cream.

phrases.greeting: Hey! Let’s have a great game <3

phrases.computer_loses: Aww! You played great, I loved your moves ^_^ Play again?

phrases.computer_gives_check: Bet you didn't see that coming :D
phrases.player_gives_check: AHH! Get away from my king!
phrases.computer_captures_queen: Thanks for the queen! ^~^
phrases.player_captures_queen: Ugh, why did I do that?! :(
phrases.computer_promotes: My juicer turns into another piece now!
phrases.player_promotes: Ooooooohhhh, yeah I should have seen that.

phrases.opening_e4: GL HF! :D
phrases.opening_d4: I know this could turn into the London.

phrases.opening_d4_d5_queens_gambit: Oo, we’re battling for the center! :D

name: Ludwig
description: Ludwig is an American streamer, YouTuber, Smash Bros commentator, and celebrity personality. Can you defeat this PogChamps veteran?

phrases.opening_e4_c5_sicilian: 1…c5 is supposed to be good.

phrases.opening_e4_e6_french: Danny really likes this opening…a LOT.

phrases.opening_other: What is this called? You must have been coached by QT.

name: QTCinderella
description: QTCinderella is an incredibly famous streamer, world-class chef, "woman grandmaster," and Pokimane's friend. Can you beat this two-time PogChamps participant?

phrases.greeting: I don't think you're ready to face a WGM.

phrases.opening_e4_e6_french: Sure... Why not play this move?

phrases.opening_d4_d5_queens_gambit: Playing the same move as White is smart.
phrases.opening_other: I don't understand what's going on.

name: boxbox
description: Boxbox is a star content creator and League of Legends streamer. Can you beat this two-time PogChamps participant?

phrases.greeting: Hey, there! Let's play some chess, shall we?
phrases.computer_wins: GG! Seems like working on puzzles every time I go to the bathroom is paying off! Let's play another one!
phrases.computer_loses: Oooh, no. Oh well, GG. At least I beat Ludwig. Let's play again!

phrases.computer_gives_check: What if I give you this check?
